name: eslint-plugin-rgaa-tests
description: Test workspace for RGAA accessibility linting rules

scripts.test: node -e "const { TestRunner } = require('eslint-plugin-rgaa-test'); new TestRunner({ configPath: './eslint-plugin-rgaa-test/src/utils/eslint-config.js' }).runAllTests();"
scripts.test:verbose: node -e "const { TestRunner } = require('eslint-plugin-rgaa-test'); new TestRunner({ verbose: true, configPath: './eslint-plugin-rgaa-test/src/utils/eslint-config.js' }).runAllTests();"
scripts.test:criterion: node -e "const { TestRunner } = require('eslint-plugin-rgaa-test'); const criterion = process.argv[1]; new TestRunner().testCriterion(criterion);"
scripts.add-criterion: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); execSync('node eslint-plugin-rgaa-test/dist/add-criterion.js ' + process.argv.slice(2).join(' '), { stdio: 'inherit' });"

author: Renaud Heluin
